mapper.select: SELECT q.content, q.indate AS inDate, q.title, q.state, us.user_number AS usersNumber, q.qna_number AS qnaNumber, q.regdate AS regDate, q.image FROM qna q INNER JOIN users us ON q.users_usernumber = us.user_number
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (content, indate, title, state, users_usernumber, qna_number, regdate, image) VALUE (#{content}, #{inDate}, #{title}, #{usersNumber}, #{state}, #{usersNumber}, #{qnaNumber}, #{regDate}, #{image} )
mapper.update: UPDATE qna SET content = #{content}, title = #{title}, regdate = #{regDate} WHERE (qna_number = #{qnaNumber})
